name: O Conto de Ada
summary: O Conto de Ada is a textual mobile game, based on an original science-fiction story, where your choices define your paths within the game. Through an immersive narrative and soundtrack, you take on the role of Ada, an aerospace engineer responsible for researching and terraforming planets. His companions on this mission are Iatso, a monitoring artificial intelligence, and Azazel, a grumpy diary robot. In this context you will embark on an interplanetary space exploration knowing more about yourself and the universe from the choices you make.
